title: Mediterranean Lamb and Lentil Stew
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '675g lamb shoulder arm chops, cubed, round bones reserved', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 onion, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '200g lentils, picked over and rinsed', '500ml chicken stock, or more as needed', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '3 carrots, peeled and sliced', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '1/2 teaspoon dried sage', '1/2 teaspoon dried basil', '100g coarsely chopped fresh spinach', '1 lemon, juiced and zested', '75g ricotta salata cheese, crumbled']
